name: The Other Side of me
description:
Final version of this game is at this link(Uploaded just 3 after game jam overed)

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1WZTAczzgsYRPBpnukSvh-GNOlFKdVE6x/view?usp=shari...

Voice Artist - Pradnya Jagannath Nagpure. 

Game developer - Prajwal Jagannath Nagpure.

The Other Side of me is a game in which you have to make player remember about her past.

Minimal Interaction.    -   no UI and just AWD movements. 

Two views.      -     To control angel and Demon.

Controls

A    -    Left.

D    -   Right.

w    -    Jump.

Made within 48 hours.
